lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee said on Thursday it has disqualified two athletes from the 2008 Beijing Olympics, including a Cuban discus silver medallist, after retesting of samples found evidence they had used banned substances.

headline.print_headline: IOC Sanctions Two Beijing Olympians Including Cuba Silver Medalist
headline.main: IOC Sanctions Two Beijing Olympians Including Cuba Silver Medalist

snippet: The International Olympic Committee said on Thursday it has disqualified two athletes from the 2008 Beijing Olympics, including a Cuban discus silver medallist, after retesting of samples found evidence they had used banned substances....
